screen_desc: The screenshot shows the home screen of an Android smartphone. The top of the screen displays the time as 8:38 and the date as Monday, Nov 28. There is a Google search bar at the bottom, along with a dock containing app icons for Google Maps, Messages, YouTube, Chrome, and Gmail. The background is a gradient of pink to purple. There are status icons at the top indicating network signal, battery level, and possibly an alarm set.
action_think: To show the shopping cart on amazon.com and proceed with the user request, I should open the Chrome browser app. Once Chrome is open, I can navigate to Amazon's website, search for the Bose SoundLink Mini, add it to the cart, and proceed to checkout.

Search for 'Bose SoundLink Mini' on the Amazon website.
Select the product from the search results.
Add the product to the shopping cart.

The landing page shows a search result for "razer blackwidow" keyboards.
